title: Shivers

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, guess the role of any player. If correct, give them a Bad Omen. 3 uses. This is not a visiting ability.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Players with Bad Omens are informed they have it, and will die in 3 nights to an unstoppable attack. (Ex: receive a Bad Omen on night 1, die on night 4.)
- All Bad Omens are erased when you die.
- You can talk to the dead. You appear as the Medium.
- While you control The Psychopath, in addition to your night action you may select a player to astrally give a Bad Omen to. If you kill a player while controlling the Psychopath, reduce the timer for all active Bad Omens by one night.
Kill Note Addition:
*"Can you feel that trembling chill run down your spine?"*

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Ensure only you and your emotions remain.

desc:
Post 4927
*Raise the hair on your neck. Receive omens. Hear the masked whispering of ghosts.*
